website_summaries.verdict: This is a budget version of the earlier Surface model, and users complain about performance and glitches. Best avoided.
pros: An inexpensive tablet that can be used as a "bedside" tablet for reading, gaming, and other might activities
Users find it runs for at least 5 hours on a charge
cons: Many reports of bugs, glitches, and hardware failure
The charger apparently can't charge the tablet while it's also in use, and some users couldn't reliably watch full-screen video due to the sluggish hardware

customer_reviews.title: Froze after 3 minutes of use, trying to sign ...
customer_reviews.text: Froze after 3 minutes of use, trying to sign into my email. 10 minutes later, froze again looking at pictures on Dropbox. Froze several more times while on Facebook or other website. Charged for an hour and wouldn't turn on until 30 minutes of trying. Obviously received a defective product..
customer_reviews.author: Colin Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale at a pretty great price. Nice for students who don't want to lug around a real laptop all day. I wish it was bundled with the keyboard or the Surface Pen because to buy those separately is very expensive, but I'm fine using mine as just a tablet. Only issue is most websites will load normally as if you're on a full blown computer, and it's hard to tap around those webpages with your finger. Microsoft needs to do something so websites realize you're using a tablet and they load as mobile sites or tablet friendly sites. Similar to how websites know you're using your phone and automatically load the mobile friendly version of their site.
customer_reviews.author: ishopalot

customer_reviews.title: Surface 3 is a nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: Could have sworn that 4g/LTE was listed in the item description and I am disappointed that it doesnt come with a card slot so I could use cellular data without tethering. Still, S3 Is a great little machine. I already had a 1 yr Ms10 Home subscription, this added 9 months to my contract. Bluetooth connects easily with my cheapo earphone. And the Razor kb and mouse connect flawlessly as well via USB 2.4 donglewhen needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Fun for basic use.
customer_reviews.text: For a basic laptop substitute (email, browsing the internet, etc etc) this thing is pretty awesome. Even with the atom processor, this little thing chugs along. Tried loading a video editing software of mine just to see how it runs and...it didn't. So obviously, this isn't powerful enough to do much of anything in terms of photo and video editing. Also, windows 10 is buggy. But this thing is fun to use, compact and mobile. I would definitely recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Good Job Microsoft
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my wife for Christmas. It is replacing her main laptop, and is used mainly for copy-editing, web/youtube surfing, and music listening. I am impressed with the build quality and responsiveness, but I am disappointing that the peripherals are all sold separately and at a premium cost. I would recommend this to anyone who is interested in replacing their laptop with a tablet. It has the full functionality of Windows 10, and can burn disks with an external disk-drive. Good job Microsoft, you finally did something right.

Other then that I love it!

The display is nice and the wifi is consistent. My only complaint is that it does not come with a keyboard or pen that is often seen in the advertisements. Overall a great value for a great product.

It's also touch screen and offers a tablet mode. This device does run a full version of Windows and will be able to handle most daily activities. SSD is standard on the model. product_meta.title: Microsoft Surface 3 Tablet (10.8-Inch, 64 GB, Intel Atom, Windows 10)
product_meta.description:
Microsoft Surface 3 is the perfect productivity device for school, home, and on the go. It features a 10.8\" Full HD touchscreen display with 1920 x 1280 resolution and is fast, responsive, and can run everything you need. With a thin, light frame that weighs less than 1.5 pounds, it’s the perfect size to take with you anywhere. The optional Surface Pen (sold separately) feels just like an actual pen so it’s easy to draw, take notes, or write music. Windows 8.1
